title: For sale: 1896 Boston Sunday Globe Art Supplement
author: cincicards

posts.post_title: For sale: 1896 Boston Sunday Globe Art Supplement
posts.post_content:
For sale: 1896 Boston Sunday Globe Art Supplement, the supplement measures 10 inches x 7-1/2 inches and is in overall very good to excellent condition.

Further info on the supplement from the Old Cardboard web site:

[url]http://www.oldcardboard.com/m/boston-sunday-globe/bsg.asp?cardsetID=1409[/url]


Asking $225 + $5 s/h = $230 - Check or money order.


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=15570&d=1268793226[/IMG]
